version_description: Performance improvements

- Fix for privacy policy acceptance not sticking (may have to re-accept one more time)
- Better crash handling and reporting
- Fix for not being able to paste in login fields

- Fix filter for certs and "None"
- Fix for profile crash
- Tapping item images now allows you to filter for that item
- Add loading indicator when adding and editing trades

- Sync items with site on startup
- Update account settings from app
- New loading animation
- Add announcements banner and latest news alerts
- Fix login on iPad

- Performance upgrades
- Fix for being unable to close announcement

- Add blueprint support
- Periodically checked for new items
- Open user profiles from comments
- Navigate to trades after creation

- Add blueprint support
- Trade up to 99,999 credits per slot
- Periodically check for new items
- Open user profiles from comments
- Navigate to trades after creation

New:
- Live Item Shop! Check out all current and past Rocket League items for sale in the ingame Item Shop, right in our app!

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed bug when selecting an item to filter on from the Items tab
- Fixed bug where editing a trade would always reset the trade to your default platformNew:

New:
- Updated trade editor, no more horizontal scrolling needed to add more than 4 items to trades
- Live Item Shop! Check out all current and past Rocket League items for sale in the ingame Item Shop, right in our app!

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed "Very rare" items in the Item Shop
- Fixed bug when selecting an item to filter on from the Items tab
- Fixed bug where editing a trade would always reset the trade to your default platform

New:
- Add avatar borders item category

Bug fixes:
- Fix ad banners covering content
- Optimize message data usage
- Fix Item Shops not loading after delayed shop update

1.4.0
Push Notifications!

This update finally adds the much requested push notifications for trade comments and messages with more notification types on the way (Item shop updates anyone?)!

Other features:
- Search from the select category screen!
- You don’t need to select a category before searching now, search all the items right from the categories
- Performance updates
- Fix some memory issues that slow the app down after using for a long time
- Fix item image caching

1.4.0
Push Notifications!

This update finally adds the much requested push notifications for trade comments and messages with more notification types on the way (Item shop updates anyone?)!

Other features:
- Search from the select category screen!
- You don’t need to select a category before searching now, search all the items right from the categories
- Performance updates
- Fix some memory issues that slow the app down after using for a long time
- Fix item image caching

1.5.0
Report Report Report!
This update adds the ability to report other users and report specific trades. This was a much requested feature and is essential for keeping our community safe. Our crew of site mods review hundreds of reports daily and ban many scammers and phishers daily. Speaking of our staff, you'll be able to see a list of all our lovely staff on our new About page that you can get to from the redesigned profile page along with several other helpful links!
Changelog
- Fix Connection Error on startup
- Fix random logouts while using the app
- Report Users and Trades
- Profile redesign
- online status
- timezone info
- other useful links (Check it out yourself!)
- Forgot password button

1.5.1
Fix issue where viewing some profiles crashed the app

New:
- Darkmode
- Translations (Use the app in your native language! Not all languages are supported.)
- User blocking
- Better trade, profile and settings design
- Engine sounds item category
- Open Trading section prefiltered when tapping an Item Shop item

Fixed:
- Fix trade comments not sending
- Fix auto-correct not working on messages and comments
- Fix app freezing after opening it from a notification
- Fix random user switches in messages
- Fix max quantity 50 credits on trade items
- Fix item background refresh
- Fix a bug that allowed users to add more than 10 items to a trade
- Fix search bar not working
- Fix keyboard not showing when starting a conversation

- Message archiving

New:
- Notification center – never miss a notification again!

New:
- Trade bumping! You can now bump your trades without editing them.
- Item market prices right in the app!
- Redesigned trade filter
- Limit your trade searches with a credit range
- Check when an item has been in the item shop
- Trade edits without a cooldown, edit your trades whenever you like!
- Select multiple platforms per trade
- Select item series on trade creation and filtering
- Link your Epic Games account to your RL Garage account
- Add painted sets to your trades
- Add certified sets to your trades
- Trades with long notes section will be collapsed

- Fix server error on app startup
